definitions.definition: To experience an unexpected , typically intermittent malfunction .
examples: My computer keeps glitching ; every couple of hours it just reboots without warning.

definitions.definition: To perform an exploit or recreate a bug while playing a video game.
examples: His character will glitch into the wall and out of the level.

main_definition: ( intransitive , especially of machines ) To experience an unexpected , typically intermittent malfunction .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , video games ) To perform an exploit or recreate a bug while playing a video game.
